original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed steady on Thursday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 31.25/50 percent on Thursday, steady from 31.25/75 percent a day earlier.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 28.10/30 percent, steady from 28.00/25 percent a day earlier. (Colombo/ Mar 16/2023)
